title: The benefit of the regulation mentioned at (a) above may be extended to plots of land leased out or agreed to be leased out by CIDCO earlier with different (lower) FSI, in Zones other than predominantly Commercial Zone, provided further that all other UDCPR provisions including parking are fully complied with
clause_text: The benefit of the regulation mentioned at (a) above may be extended to plots of land leased out or agreed to be leased out by CIDCO earlier with different (lower) FSI, in Zones other than predominantly Commercial Zone, provided further that all other UDCPR provisions including parking are fully complied with.
section: (#) 10.10.1 Basic FSI Permissible for Certain Categories of Plots.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
